name: Tatsu
description: Japanese legend tells of a great battle between two mighty Dragon Lord armies, locked in combat on the peaks of Mount Hotaka, competing to win the hand of the Princess Kushinada, the last and most beautiful of eight sisters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP or better Processor: 1 gHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ w/ GL_ARB_framebuffer_object Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win XP or better Processor: 2 gHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3+ Storage: 300 MB available space
